title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Natural Features & Ecosystems
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems               Natural Features & Ecosystems        A wetland area at Weir Farm National Historic Site. National Park Service, Weir Farm National Historic Site   Â    Weir Farm is fortunate to contain numerous wetland areas; from small seasonally wet vernal pools, to wooded swamps, to the open freshwater Weir Pond.  All of the property east of Nod Hill Road is included within the Norwalk River Watershed.
